levels.description: Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Mizuki's first Talent targets <@ba.vup>2</> additional enemies and inflicts <$ba.stun>Stun</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds; When attacks hit less than 3 enemies, Mizuki loses <@ba.vup>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> Max HP
